artist: artist: Audrey Flack; printer: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; publisher: Democratic National Committee, Washington, D.C.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Colleciton, Gift of The Northern Star Foundation and The Fiduciary Fund
description: From a suite of six prints by six American artists, commissioned by Joan Mondale as a fundraiser for the re-election campaign of President Jimmy Carter. The other prints in the suite are by Ansel Adams, Romare Bearden, Sam Francis, Robert Indiana, and Wayne Thiebaud. Flack's was the only work in the portfolio printed at Vermillion Editions.
inscription: Titled in pencil, LL margin: Banana Split Sundae
markings:

title: Banana Split Sundae
